input.parameter: SELECT tenancy_type, registration_num, registration_date, CASE tenancy_type WHEN -1 THEN 'ошибка' WHEN 0 THEN 'комплекс помещений' WHEN 1 THEN 'комната' WHEN 2 THEN 'комнаты' WHEN 3 THEN 'квартира' WHEN 4 THEN 'квартиры' WHEN 5 THEN 'частный дом' WHEN 6 THEN 'частные дома' WHEN 7 THEN 'квартира с подселением' WHEN 8 THEN 'квартиры с подселением' END AS tenancy_premises_str, CONCAT( IF(v.begin_date IS NULL,'',CONCAT('с $b$',DATE_FORMAT(v.begin_date,'%d.%m.%Y'),'$/b$')), IF (v.begin_date IS NULL AND v.end_date IS NULL, '', ' '), IF(v.end_date IS NULL,'',CONCAT('по $b$',DATE_FORMAT(v.end_date,'%d.%m.%Y'),'$/b$'))) AS rent_period, NULL AS guardian FROM ( SELECT f_tenancy_contract_type(tp.id_process) AS tenancy_type, tp.registration_num, tp.registration_date, tp.begin_date, tp.end_date FROM tenancy_processes tp WHERE deleted <> 1 AND (tp.registration_num IS NOT NULL) AND tp.id_process = [id_process]) v
В договоре найма не указано нанимаемое жилье

SELECT CONCAT( 'общая площадь — ', CAST(SUM(v.total_area) AS CHAR),' кв.м.', ', в том числе жилая — ', CAST(SUM(v.living_area) AS CHAR),' кв.м.') AS premise_info, CONCAT(GROUP_CONCAT( CONCAT(REPLACE(vks.street_name,'жилрайон.', 'жилой район'),', д. ', b.house, IF(v.sub_premise_num IS NULL,'',CONCAT(', ', v.sub_premise_num)) ) SEPARATOR ', '),'.') AS rent_address FROM ( SELECT p.id_premises, CONCAT('кв. ',p.premises_num,' ком. ', GROUP_CONCAT(sp.sub_premises_num SEPARATOR ', ')) AS sub_premise_num, SUM(sp.total_area) AS living_area, SUM(sp.total_area) AS total_area FROM tenancy_sub_premises_assoc tspa INNER JOIN sub_premises sp ON tspa.id_sub_premises = sp.id_sub_premises INNER JOIN premises p ON sp.id_premises = p.id_premises WHERE tspa.deleted <> 1 AND sp.deleted <> 1 AND p.deleted <> 1 AND tspa.id_process = [id_process] GROUP BY sp.id_premises UNION ALL SELECT p.id_premises, CONCAT('ком. ',p.premises_num), p.living_area, p.total_area FROM tenancy_premises_assoc tpa INNER JOIN premises p ON tpa.id_premises = p.id_premises WHERE tpa.deleted <> 1 AND p.deleted <> 1 AND tpa.id_process = [id_process] AND p.id_premises_type = 2 ) v INNER JOIN premises p ON p.id_premises = v.id_premises INNER JOIN buildings b ON p.id_building = b.id_building INNER JOIN v_kladr_streets vks ON b.id_street = vks.id_street;

SELECT CONCAT( 'общая площадь — ', CAST(SUM(v.total_area) AS CHAR),' кв.м.', ', в том числе жилая — ', CAST(SUM(v.living_area) AS CHAR),' кв.м.') AS premise_info, CONCAT(GROUP_CONCAT( CONCAT(REPLACE(vks.street_name,'жилрайон.', 'жилой район'),', д. ', b.house, IF(v.sub_premise_num IS NULL,'',CONCAT(', ', v.sub_premise_num)) ) SEPARATOR ', '),'.') AS rent_address FROM ( SELECT p.id_premises, CONCAT('кв. ',p.premises_num,' ком. ', GROUP_CONCAT(sp.sub_premises_num SEPARATOR ', ')) AS sub_premise_num, SUM(sp.total_area) AS living_area, SUM(sp.total_area) AS total_area FROM tenancy_sub_premises_assoc tspa INNER JOIN sub_premises sp ON tspa.id_sub_premises = sp.id_sub_premises INNER JOIN premises p ON sp.id_premises = p.id_premises WHERE tspa.deleted <> 1 AND sp.deleted <> 1 AND p.deleted <> 1 AND tspa.id_process = [id_process] GROUP BY sp.id_premises UNION ALL SELECT p.id_premises, CONCAT('ком. ',p.premises_num), p.living_area, p.total_area FROM tenancy_premises_assoc tpa INNER JOIN premises p ON tpa.id_premises = p.id_premises WHERE tpa.deleted <> 1 AND p.deleted <> 1 AND tpa.id_process = [id_process] AND p.id_premises_type = 2 ) v INNER JOIN premises p ON p.id_premises = v.id_premises INNER JOIN buildings b ON p.id_building = b.id_building INNER JOIN v_kladr_streets vks ON b.id_street = vks.id_street;

SELECT CONCAT(REPLACE(vks.street_name,'жилрайон.', 'жилой район'),', д. ', b.house, IF(p.premises_num IS NULL,'',CONCAT(', кв. ', p.premises_num)) ) AS rent_address, CONCAT('количество комнат — ', IF(IFNULL(sp.sub_premises_count,0) <= p.num_rooms, p.num_rooms, sp.sub_premises_count), ', общая площадь — ', p.total_area,' кв.м.', ', в том числе жилая — ', p.living_area,' кв.м.') AS premise_info FROM tenancy_premises_assoc tpa INNER JOIN premises p ON tpa.id_premises = p.id_premises INNER JOIN buildings b ON p.id_building = b.id_building INNER JOIN v_kladr_streets vks ON b.id_street = vks.id_street LEFT JOIN (SELECT id_premises, COUNT(*) AS sub_premises_count FROM sub_premises WHERE deleted <> 1 GROUP BY id_premises) sp ON p.id_premises = sp.id_premises WHERE tpa.deleted <> 1 AND p.deleted <> 1 AND b.deleted <> 1 AND tpa.id_process = [id_process]

SELECT CONCAT(REPLACE(vks.street_name,'жилрайон.', 'жилой район'),', д. ', b.house) AS rent_address, CONCAT('количество комнат - ', IF(IFNULL(v2.rooms_count,0) > b.num_rooms, v2.rooms_count,b.num_rooms), ', общая площадь — ',b.total_area,' кв.м.', ', в том числе жилая - ', b.living_area,' кв.м.') AS premise_info FROM tenancy_buildings_assoc tba INNER JOIN buildings b ON tba.id_building = b.id_building INNER JOIN v_kladr_streets vks ON b.id_street = vks.id_street LEFT JOIN (SELECT id_building, COUNT(*) AS rooms_count FROM premises p WHERE p.id_premises_type = 2 AND p.deleted <> 1 GROUP BY p.id_building) v2 ON b.id_building = v2.id_building WHERE tba.deleted <> 1 AND b.deleted <> 1 AND tba.id_process = [id_process]

SELECT CONCAT(REPLACE(vks.street_name,'жилрайон.', 'жилой район'),', д. ', b.house, IF(v.premises_num IS NULL,'',CONCAT(', ', v.premises_num))) AS rent_address, v.rooms_count, CONCAT( 'количество комнат — ', v.shared_rooms_count,', ', 'общая площадь — ', CAST(v.total_area AS CHAR),' кв.м.', ', в том числе жилая — ', CAST(v.living_area AS CHAR),' кв.м. ',IFNULL(v.rooms_area_details,'')) AS premise_info FROM ( SELECT p.id_premises, p.id_building, IF(IFNULL(rooms_count,0) <= p.num_rooms, p.num_rooms, rooms_count) AS rooms_count, COUNT(*) shared_rooms_count, CONCAT('кв. ',p.premises_num,', ком. ', GROUP_CONCAT(sp.sub_premises_num SEPARATOR ', ')) AS premises_num, SUM(sp.total_area) AS total_area, SUM(sp.total_area) AS living_area, IF(COUNT(*) = 1, NULL, CONCAT('(',GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(sp.total_area,' кв.м.') SEPARATOR ', '),')')) AS rooms_area_details FROM tenancy_sub_premises_assoc tspa INNER JOIN sub_premises sp ON tspa.id_sub_premises = sp.id_sub_premises INNER JOIN premises p ON sp.id_premises = p.id_premises LEFT JOIN (SELECT sp.id_premises,COUNT(*) AS rooms_count FROM sub_premises sp WHERE sp.deleted <> 1 GROUP BY sp.id_premises) v_sp ON p.id_premises = v_sp.id_premises WHERE tspa.deleted <> 1 AND p.deleted <> 1 AND p.id_premises_type = 3 AND tspa.id_process = [id_process] GROUP BY p.id_premises LIMIT 1) v INNER JOIN buildings b ON v.id_building = b.id_building INNER JOIN v_kladr_streets vks ON b.id_street = vks.id_street

SELECT CONCAT('общая площадь — ',tspa.rent_total_area) AS premise_info, CONCAT(REPLACE(vks.street_name,'жилрайон.', 'жилой район'), ', д. ', b.house, ', ', IFNULL(pt.premises_type_short,'кв.'), ' ', p.premises_num, IF(sp.sub_premises_num IS NULL,'',CONCAT(', ком. ', sp.sub_premises_num))) AS rent_address FROM tenancy_sub_premises_assoc tspa INNER JOIN sub_premises sp ON tspa.id_sub_premises = sp.id_sub_premises INNER JOIN premises p ON sp.id_premises = p.id_premises INNER JOIN buildings b ON p.id_building = b.id_building INNER JOIN v_kladr_streets vks ON b.id_street = vks.id_street INNER JOIN premises_types pt ON p.id_premises_type = pt.id_premises_type WHERE tspa.deleted <> 1 AND tspa.rent_total_area IS NOT NULL AND tspa.id_process = [id_process] UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT('общая площадь — ',IFNULL(tpa.rent_total_area, tpa.rent_living_area)) AS premise_info, CONCAT(REPLACE(vks.street_name,'жилрайон.', 'жилой район'), ', д. ', b.house, ', ', IFNULL(pt.premises_type_short,'кв.'), ' ', p.premises_num) AS rent_address FROM tenancy_premises_assoc tpa INNER JOIN premises p ON tpa.id_premises = p.id_premises INNER JOIN buildings b ON p.id_building = b.id_building INNER JOIN v_kladr_streets vks ON b.id_street = vks.id_street INNER JOIN premises_types pt ON p.id_premises_type = pt.id_premises_type WHERE tpa.deleted <> 1 AND (tpa.rent_total_area IS NOT NULL OR tpa.rent_living_area IS NOT NULL) AND tpa.id_process = [id_process] UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT('общая площадь — ',IFNULL(tba.rent_total_area, tba.rent_living_area)) AS premise_info, CONCAT(REPLACE(vks.street_name,'жилрайон.', 'жилой район'), ', д. ', b.house) AS rent_address FROM tenancy_buildings_assoc tba INNER JOIN buildings b ON tba.id_building = b.id_building INNER JOIN v_kladr_streets vks ON b.id_street = vks.id_street WHERE tba.deleted <> 1 AND (tba.rent_total_area IS NOT NULL OR tba.rent_living_area IS NOT NULL) AND tba.id_process = [id_process]
Вы пытаетесь распечатать неподдерживаемый тип договора. Проверьте перечень сдаваемого жилья.

SELECT CONCAT(tp.surname, ' ', tp.`name`, IF(tp.patronymic IS NULL, '', CONCAT(' ', tp.patronymic))) AS tenant_snp, DATE_FORMAT(tp.date_of_birth,'%d.%m.%Y') AS tenant_date_of_birth FROM tenancy_persons tp WHERE deleted <> 1 AND tp.id_kinship = 1 AND tp.id_process = [id_process] LIMIT 1

SELECT CONCAT(chairman.surname, ' ', chairman.`name`, IF(chairman.patronymic IS NULL, '', CONCAT(' ', chairman.patronymic))) AS chairman_snp, chairman.post AS chairman_post, snp_template.snp_template, committee.committee_name FROM ( SELECT h.*, cw.chairman_warrant FROM history_chairmans h INNER JOIN chairman_warrants cw ON h.id_chairman_warrant = cw.id_chairman_warrant WHERE start_date = (SELECT MAX(start_date) AS max_date FROM history_chairmans WHERE start_date < ( SELECT tp.registration_date FROM tenancy_processes tp WHERE deleted <> 1 AND (tp.registration_date IS NOT NULL) AND tp.id_process = [id_process])) LIMIT 1) chairman JOIN ( SELECT * FROM history_sign_doc_snp_templates WHERE start_date = (SELECT MAX(start_date) AS max_date FROM history_sign_doc_snp_templates WHERE start_date < ( SELECT tp.registration_date FROM tenancy_processes tp WHERE deleted <> 1 AND (tp.registration_date IS NOT NULL) AND tp.id_process = [id_process])) LIMIT 1) snp_template JOIN ( SELECT * FROM history_committee_names WHERE start_date = (SELECT MAX(start_date) AS max_date FROM history_committee_names WHERE start_date < ( SELECT tp.registration_date FROM tenancy_processes tp WHERE deleted <> 1 AND (tp.registration_date IS NOT NULL) AND tp.id_process = [id_process])) LIMIT 1) committee

SELECT tr.id_reason, IF(tr.id_reason = 23, 'в целях реализации муниципальной целевой программы «Переселение граждан из ветхого и аварийного жилищного фонда в городе Братске на 2005-2025 гг.», утвержденной', 'на основании решения о предоставлении жилого помещения:') AS reason_group, GROUP_CONCAT(tr.reason_prepared) AS reasons FROM tenancy_reasons tr WHERE tr.deleted <> 1 AND tr.id_process = [id_process] LIMIT 1

SELECT CONCAT('в лице ', IFNULL(chairman.post_genetive,''),' ') AS prefix, CONCAT(chairman.surname, ' ', chairman.`name`, IF(chairman.patronymic IS NULL, '', CONCAT(' ', chairman.patronymic))) AS snp, CONCAT(', ',chairman_warrant) AS warrant FROM ( SELECT h.*, cw.chairman_warrant FROM history_chairmans h INNER JOIN chairman_warrants cw ON h.id_chairman_warrant = cw.id_chairman_warrant WHERE start_date = (SELECT MAX(start_date) AS max_date FROM history_chairmans WHERE start_date < ( SELECT tp.registration_date FROM tenancy_processes tp WHERE deleted <> 1 AND (tp.registration_date IS NOT NULL) AND tp.id_process = [id_process])) LIMIT 1) chairman

SELECT CONCAT(tp.surname, ' ', tp.`name`, IF(tp.patronymic IS NULL, '', CONCAT(' ', tp.patronymic))) AS tenant_snp, CONCAT( IFNULL(tp.document_num,''), IF(tp.document_num IS NULL AND tp.document_seria IS NULL,'',' '), IFNULL(tp.document_seria,'')) AS tenant_document, CONCAT( IF(tp.registration_id_street IS NULL,'', CONCAT('место регистрации: ',IFNULL(CONCAT(vks1.street_name, IF(tp.registration_house IS NULL,'',CONCAT(' д. ',tp.registration_house)), IF(tp.registration_flat IS NULL,'',CONCAT(' кв. ',tp.registration_flat)), IF(tp.registration_room IS NULL,'',CONCAT(' ком. ',tp.registration_room))) ,''))), IF(tp.residence_id_street IS NULL,'', CONCAT('место проживания: ',IFNULL(CONCAT(vks2.street_name, IF(tp.residence_house IS NULL,'',CONCAT(' д. ',tp.registration_house)), IF(tp.residence_flat IS NULL,'',CONCAT(' кв. ',tp.registration_flat)), IF(tp.residence_room IS NULL,'',CONCAT(' ком. ',tp.registration_room))) ,''))) ) AS tenant_address FROM tenancy_persons tp LEFT JOIN v_kladr_streets vks1 ON tp.registration_id_street = vks1.id_street LEFT JOIN v_kladr_streets vks2 ON tp.residence_id_street = vks2.id_street WHERE deleted <> 1 AND tp.id_kinship = 1 AND tp.id_process = [id_process] AND exclude_date IS NULL LIMIT 1

SELECT @i := @i + 1 AS number, CONCAT(tp.surname, ' ', tp.`name`, IF(tp.patronymic IS NULL, '', CONCAT(' ', tp.patronymic))) AS person_snp, IF(k.id_kinship = 64,'',k.kinship) AS person_kinship, DATE_FORMAT(tp.date_of_birth,'%d.%m.%Y') AS date_of_birth FROM tenancy_persons tp INNER JOIN kinships k ON tp.id_kinship = k.id_kinship, (SELECT @i := 0) vars WHERE deleted <> 1 AND tp.id_kinship <> 1 AND tp.id_process = [id_process] AND exclude_date IS NULL
